actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) poison damage.

actions.name: Sling
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) poison damage.

special_abilities.name: Dark Devotion
special_abilities.desc: The scorpion cultist has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

special_abilities.name: Keen Senses
special_abilities.desc: The scorpion cultist has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks.

special_abilities.name: Scorpion's Blessing
special_abilities.desc: The scorpion cultist has advantage on saving throws against poison. In addition, when the scorpion cultist hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 1d4 poison damage (included in the attack).
